</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>লেজ</p>
</label>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পাদ-চাকতি হাইড্রার দেহের অংশ।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১৭]</p>
</span>

                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রুই মাছের পায়ু পাখনায় কতটি পাখনারশ্মি আছে?</p>

                                        </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

</label>

                                            </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>৭ জোড়া</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বক্ষ পাখনায় (Pectoral fin) → ১৬-১৭ টি; শ্রোণী পাখনায় (Pelvic fin) → ৯ টি; পৃষ্ঠ পাখনায় (Dorsal fin) → ১৫-১৬; পুচ্ছ পাখনায় (Caudal fin) → ১৯ টি।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কার্ডিয়া - যেখানে অন্ননালি উন্মুক্ত হয়;<br>
ফানডাস - কার্ডিয়ার বামপাশের পাকস্থলি প্রাচীর;<br>
ছোট বাঁক - ডান অবতল কিনারা।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৪৮]</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Vit-K</p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পানিতে দ্রবণীয় ভিটামিন- B, C।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা- ১৫৫]</p>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ইনসুলিন হরমোন অগ্ন্যাশয়ের কোন কোষ থেকে ক্ষরিত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আলফা কোষ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিটা কোষ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আলফা কোষ → গ্লুকাগন; ডেল্টা কোষ → সোমাটোস্টাটিন; বিটা কোষ → ইনসুলিন; পিপি কোষ → প্যানক্রিয়েটিক পলিপেপটাইড<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬০]</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>α-কণায় ইলেকট্রন সংখ্যা কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আলফা কণা দ্বি-ধনাত্মক চার্জযুক্ত কণা। এতে কোন ইলেকট্রন থাকে না। আলফা কণার ভর = 4।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৪]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Solar system atom model এর&nbsp;সফলতা কী?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরমাণুর আকার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরমাণুর আকৃতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ইলেকট্রন আবর্তন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিউক্লিয়াসের অবস্থান</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: রাদারফোর্ড পরমাণু মডেলে নিউক্লিয়াস ধারণা আছে বলে একে নিউক্লিয়ার মডেল বলে। সৌর জগতের সাথে মিলে যায় তাই একে Solar system atom model বলে।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="width: 1.641em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.343em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.34em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-58"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-59"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.343em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm R_H</script></span> এর পরীক্ষালব্ধ মান কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বোর পরমাণু মডেলের ধারণা হতে নির্ণীত রিডবার্গ ধ্রুবক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="width: 1.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.11em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-107"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-108"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm R_H</script></span>&nbsp;এর মান <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>109739</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="width: 5.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.51em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-112"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">109739</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-116"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-118"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-119"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>109739</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm 109739\ cm^{-1}</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তরঙ্গ বলবিদ্যা সমীকরণ প্রদান করেন কে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিজ্ঞানী স্রোডিঞ্জার</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিজ্ঞানী হাইজেনবার্গ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিজ্ঞানী ডি-ব্রগলি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিজ্ঞানী ম্যাক্সওয়েল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বিজ্ঞানী ডি-ব্রগলি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="width: 1.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.78em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-123"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rightarrow</script></span> ইলেক্ট্রনের দ্বৈত ধর্ম (Particle-wave duality) বর্ণনা দেন।<br>
বিজ্ঞানী হাইজেনবার্গ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="width: 1.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.78em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-126"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rightarrow</script></span> ইলেক্ট্রন আবর্তনের “অনিশ্চয়তা নীতি” প্রদান করেন।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বোর পরমাণু মডেল অনুসারে ইলেকট্রনের শক্তিস্তরের আকৃতি কীরূপ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৩]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘g’ উপশক্তিস্তরে মোট অরবিটাল সংখ্যা কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>12</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>5</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>7</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>9</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>‘g’ উপশক্তিস্তরে l = 4;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-129"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm \therefore</script></span> মোট অরবিটাল সংখ্যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="width: 12.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1009.96em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-132"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm =(2l+1)=(2\times4+1)= 9</script></span> টি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরমাণুর আকার জানা যায়</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৭]</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৭]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটিতে নিউট্রন অনুপস্থিত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হাইড্রোজেন&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হিলিয়াম</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আলফা কণা</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ডিউটেরিয়াম</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>আইসোটোপের ধর্মের দিক থেকে নিচের কোনটি ভিন্ন?</p>

পৃথিবীর বয়স নির্ণয় → কার্বন-14<br>
[গুহ স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৬]</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: f-অরবিটালে আটটি করে ইলেকট্রন লোবকে তিনটি নোডাল প্লেন আলাদা করে রাখে।<br>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Ca পরমাণুর সর্ববহিঃস্থ স্তরের ২টি ইলেকট্রনের ৪টি কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার সেট কোনটি?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="width: 16.806em; top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-343"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.458em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm n=4,l=2,m=1,s=+\frac{1}{2},-\frac{1}{2} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২২]</p>

                                            <span>Question 47 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন সেটটি শক্তিক্রম অনুসারে আউফবাউ নীতি মেনে চলে?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="width: 6.742em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.512em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1005.47em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-377"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm 3s > 3p > 5s</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অরবিটালের শক্তি (n+l)<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="width: 7.912em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.477em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1006.44em, 6.969em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-387"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1006.23em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1006.44em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -2.826em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1006.44em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -1.596em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.264em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm 5s=5+0=5&nbsp;\\
4d=4+2=6&nbsp;\\
5p=5+1=6 &nbsp;</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 48 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কত তরঙ্গদৈর্ঘ্যের UV-রশ্মি লাইট থেরাপিতে ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>200</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2013;</mo><mn>400</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="width: 5.576em;                                     <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 50 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>উচ্চস্তর থেকে ইলেকট্রন কোন শক্তিস্তরে ফিরে আসলে প্যাশ্চেন সিরিজ উৎপন্ন হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>১ম</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২য়</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>৪র্থ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: উচ্চ স্তর থেকে ইলেকট্রন ১ম শক্তিস্তরে ফিরে আসলে হয় লাইমেন সিরিজ;<br>
উচ্চ স্তর থেকে ইলেকট্রন ২য় শক্তিস্তরে ফিরে আসলে হয় বামার সিরিজ;<br>
উচ্চ স্তর থেকে ইলেকট্রন ৪র্থ শক্তিস্তরে ফিরে আসলে হয় ব্রাকেট সিরিজ;<br>
উচ্চ স্তর থেকে ইলেকট্রন ৫ম শক্তিস্তরে ফিরে আসলে হয় ফুন্&zwnj;ড&nbsp;সিরিজ।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 51 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>জৈব যৌগে কার্যকরী মূলক শনাক্তকরণে কোনটি ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Near-IR</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Middle-IR</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Far-IR</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Cellular-IR</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Near-IR - চিকিৎসা ক্ষেত্রে;<br>
Far-IR - চিকিৎসা ক্ষেত্রে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 52 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>শিখা পরীক্ষায় কোনটির বর্ণ কোবাল্ট কাঁচ দিয়ে হালকা সবুজ দেখায়?</p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="width: 2.689em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কোবাল্ট ব্লু-গ্লাসে বিশেষ কোন বর্ণ নেই <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="width: 4.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.73em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-514"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-516"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-518"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-519"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-524"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm Cu^{2+},&nbsp;Na^+</script></span> কিন্তু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="width: 1.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1001.15em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-528"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-529"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm K^+</script></span> গোলাপি লাল শিখা প্রদর্শন করে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 53 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="width: 2.61em;                                         </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="width: 1.846em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধিতে যাদের দ্রাব্যতা হ্রাস পায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                             </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 55 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>108</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>5</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="width: 3.053em;
