top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-668"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">108</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-670"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>108</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>5</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm 108S^5 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>.1</mn><mn>1</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="width: 12.912em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1010.58em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-674"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-675"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-678"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-681"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-683"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-684"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-695"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.23em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-696"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-700"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-701"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-707"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>.1</mn><mn>1</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm x^xy^xS^{x+y}=2^2.1^1\left(S\right)^{2+1}=4S^3&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৭০]</p>

                                    </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গোলীয় তলের বক্রতার ব্যাসার্ধ নির্ণয়ের জন্য কোনটি ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ত্বরণ থাকে না</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ঋণাত্মক কাজের ক্ষেত্রে গতিশক্তি হ্রাস পায়।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন বস্তুর গতিশক্তি 4 গুণ হলে, ভরবেগের কীরূপ পরিবর্তন ঘটবে?</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.56em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.559em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.85em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.875em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 1.15em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1005.04em, 4.305em, -999.998em); position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-830"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-832" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.535em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.548em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>∝</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>∝</mo><msqrt><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub></msqrt><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mn>4</mn><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\rm E_k\propto P^2 \Rightarrow P\propto\sqrt{E_k} \\ \Rightarrow\frac{P_1}{P_2}=\sqrt{\frac{{E_k}_1}{{E_k}_2}}=\ \sqrt{\frac{{E_k}_1}{4{E_k}_1}}=\frac{1}{2} \\ \therefore P_2=2P_1&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1005.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.621em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-855"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.15</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.33em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.33em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">36.75</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.15</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>20</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>36.75</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\rm P=\frac{W}{t}=\frac{Fs}{t}=\frac{mgh}{t}=\frac{50\times9.8\times0.15\times10}{20}=36.75\ W</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭৭]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 65 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি অসংরক্ষণশীল বল?</p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>

</label>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সবল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সংরক্ষণশীল বল: তড়িৎ বল, চৌম্বক বল, অভিকর্ষ বল, আদর্শ স্প্রিং-এর বিকৃতি প্রতিরোধী বল।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 66 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন নির্দিষ্ট ভরের বস্তু 2 N বল প্রয়োগে বলের দিকের সাথে 60° কোণ উৎপন্ন করে 5 m দূরে সরে গেল। কাজের পরিমাণ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>60</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-891" style="width: 19.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1015.53em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-892"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">s</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-902" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-915" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-916" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>60</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm W=F.s \ cos\theta=2\times5\ cos60=10\times\frac{1}{2}=5\ J&nbsp;</script></span>&nbsp;<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৬৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 67 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর গড় ঘনত্ব নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪৩]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 68 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন স্প্রিংকে 5 N বল দ্বারা টেনে 10 m প্রসারিত করা হলে, স্প্রিং ধ্রুবক কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1022"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1023"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="width: 10.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.89em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1049"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1063"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1065"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1066"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1068" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪৪]</p>
</span>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 69 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর ব্যাসার্ধ অর্ধেক হয়ে গেল কিন্তু ভর অপরিবর্তিত রইল, ভূপৃষ্ঠে অভিকর্ষজ ত্বরণের মানের কীরূপ পরিবর্তন হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="width: 14.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1011.6em, 3.404em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1086"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -3.195em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.941em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1089"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1001.44em, 4.592em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1090"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1092"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1093" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.629em; left: 1.559em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.01em, 1.191em, -999.998em); height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.52em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1099"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1103"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.68em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.648em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm g=\frac{GM}{R^2} ; g^\prime=\frac{GM}{\left(\frac{R}{2}\right)^2}=\frac{4GM}{R^2}=4 \ g </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪১৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 70 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সামান্তরিকের ভারকেন্দ্র কোথায় অবস্থিত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কর্ণদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দুতে</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অক্ষের প্রান্তবিন্দুতে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জ্যামিতিক কেন্দ্রে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অক্ষের মধ্যবিন্দুতে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সুষম দণ্ডের ক্ষেত্রে - মধ্যবিন্দু;&nbsp;<br>
বেলনাকৃতি বস্তুর ক্ষেত্রে - অক্ষের মধ্যবিন্দু;<br>
সামান্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রে - কর্ণদ্বয়ের ছেদ বিন্দু।<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ভূ-পৃষ্ঠের নিকটে আবর্তনরত কৃত্রিম উপগ্রহের প্রদক্ষিণ বেগ = <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7.9</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.49em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1267"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7.9</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1272"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1274"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1275"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>7.9</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm 7.9\ kms^{-1}</script></span>.<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 74 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>R পৃথিবীর ব্যাসার্ধ হলে ভূপৃষ্ঠ হতে কত উচ্চতায় g এর মান অর্ধেক হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="width: 1.141em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1338" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1339" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\rm \frac{g^\prime}{g}=1-\frac{2h}{R}\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}=1-\frac{2h}{R}\Rightarrow\frac{2h}{R}=\frac{1}{2}&nbsp;
\Rightarrow\ h=\frac{R}{4}</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 76 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 83 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Synonym for 'Deceive' is-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Guide</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Enlighten</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Mislead</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Advise</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Deceive and<b> </b>Mislead means to cheat.<b> </b>Guide<b> </b>and Advise means to show path. Enlighten means to give advice.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সত্যিকার এর অন্ধ না বোঝালে blind to ব্যবহার করা হয়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সাধারণত common noun এর আগে article a বসে।</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 88 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>He saw _____ most wonderful sight.</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>a</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>the</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>an</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>one<b> </b></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Superlative degree এর ক্ষেত্রে 'most' word দ্বারা যখন 'very' বা খুব বেশি বোঝায়, তখন&nbsp;the এর পরিবর্তে a বসে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 93 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ঐতিহাসিক ৬-দফাকে কীসের সাথে তুলনা করা হয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

    <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        
        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">MCQ Master Set: 2 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>
    </div>
            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1 </span>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: রুই মাছের তিনটি অংশ- মাথা, দেহকাণ্ড-, লেজ।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১৭]</p>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রুই মাছের বক্ষ পাখনায় কতটি পাখনারশ্মি থাকে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>১৫-১৬ টি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>১৬-১৭ টি</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>১৮-১৯ টি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বক্ষ পাখনায় (Pectoral fin) → ১৬-১৭ টি; শ্রোণী পাখনায় (Pelvic fin) → ৯ টি; পৃষ্ঠ পাখনায় (Dorsal fin) → ১৫-১৬; পুচ্ছ পাখনায় (Caudal fin) → ১৯ টি।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আলফা কোষ → গ্লুকাগন; বিটা কোষ → ইনসুলিন;<br>
ডেল্টা কোষ → সোমাটোস্ট্যাটিন; পিপি কোষ → প্যানক্রিয়েটিক পলিপেপটাইড।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬০]</p>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>6</p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আলফা কণা দ্বি-ধনাত্মক চার্জযুক্ত কণা। এতে কোন ইলেকট্রন থাকে না।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
