                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পরীক্ষা লব্ধ মান = <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>109678</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="width: 5.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.51em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-51"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">109678</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-54" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-55"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-57"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-58"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                     </div>

                                            <p>ইলেকট্রনের দ্বৈত ধর্ম সম্পর্কিত সমীকরণ প্রদান করেন কে?</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বিজ্ঞানী স্রোডিঞ্জার - তরঙ্গ বলবিদ্যা সমীকরণ;<br>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘g’ উপশক্তিস্তরের সর্বোচ্চ ইলেকট্রন ধারণ ক্ষমতা কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>9</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>16</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>18</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>32</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>‘g’ উপশক্তিস্তরে সর্বোচ্চ ইলেকট্রন ধারণ ক্ষমতা = 2(2l+1)=2(2×4+1)=18<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                        </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 38 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>N শেলের জন্য l&nbsp;এর কোন মানটি সঠিক নয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>-1</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>N শেলের জন্য n = 4;<br>
l এর মান হবে 0&nbsp;থেকে (n-1) পর্যন্ত অর্থাৎ&nbsp; 0, 1, 2, 3<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <p>কোনটিতে একটি মাত্র নিউট্রন উপস্থিত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: হাইড্রোজেন - <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mn>1</mn><mn>1</mn></msubsup></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="width: 1.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1000.9em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-62"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-63"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-64"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-65"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.895em, 1000em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-66"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em);                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যে সব পরমাণুর ভর সংখ্যা একই কিন্তু পারমাণবিক সংখ্যা ভিন্ন এদেরকে কী বলা হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোমার</p>
</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আইসোটোন → নিউট্রন সংখ্যা সমান;<br>
আইসোটোপ → প্রোটন সংখ্যা সমান।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>
</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভর প্রায় হাইড্রোজেন পরমাণুর ভরের সমান</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রোটনের চার্জ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>+</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.33em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-120"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-126"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-127"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">19</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                             </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 42 </span>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>19</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>40</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><msubsup><mo>,</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>20</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>40</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="width: 4.92em;                                     </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>14</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="width: 1.518em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

top: -4.369em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-292"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-293"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-294" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>60</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm _{} ^{60}Co </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>32</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-297" style="width: 1.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.15em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -4.383em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-301"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-302"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-303" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>32</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm _{} ^{32}P</script></span> → DNA ও RNA এর গঠন তুলনা করতে; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>131</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="width: 1.518em; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>60</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="width: 2.01em; [গুহ স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৬]</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Cu পরমাণুর সর্ববহিঃস্থ স্তরের ইলেকট্রনের <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>1</mn></msup></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="width: 1.604em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1001.31em, 2.349em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm n=2,l=1,m= +2,s=-\frac 12 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        </div>

                                        </div>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="width: 6.924em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="width: 6.924em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.649em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1005.65em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-460"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.225em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\rm 5p>5s>4d </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="width: 6.924em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.649em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1005.65em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-470"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.225em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm 5s<5p<4d </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>(n+l) এর নিয়মানুযায়ী,&nbsp;<br>
4s=4+0=4&nbsp;<br>
3d=3+2=5 &nbsp;<br>
4p=4+1=5&nbsp;<br>
∴ শক্তিক্রম : 4s&lt;3d&lt;4p<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 48 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অপটিক্যাল সেন্সর রূপে কত তরঙ্গদৈর্ঘ্যের&nbsp;অতিবেগুনি রশ্মি ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: 30 nm - 230 nm → UV-ফটোইলেকট্রন স্পেকট্রোস্কোপি; 280 nm - 400 nm → কোষ বা cell এর মেডিকেল; imaging; 300 nm - 320 nm → চিকিৎসাক্ষেত্রে লাইট থেরাপি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৪]</p>
</span>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: উচ্চ শক্তিস্তর হতে প্রথম শক্তিস্তরে&nbsp;আসলে লাইমেন সিরিজ;<br>
উচ্চ শক্তিস্তর হতে ৩য় শক্তিস্তরে&nbsp;আসলে প্যাশ্চেন সিরিজ;<br>
উচ্চ শক্তিস্তর হতে ৪র্থ শক্তিস্তরে&nbsp;আসলে ব্রাকেট সিরিজ;<br>
উচ্চ শক্তিস্তর হতে ৫ম শক্তিস্তরে&nbsp;আসলে ফুন্&zwnj;ড&nbsp;সিরিজ।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 51 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>জাল টাকা বা পাসপোর্ট শনাক্তকরণে কোনটি ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Microwave</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>X- Ray</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>UV Ray</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: X-ray চিকিৎসা ক্ষেত্রে,&nbsp;<br>
IR- রিমোট কন্ট্রোল, অপটিক্যাল ফাইবার, ফিজিওথেরাপিতে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <p>ব্লু-গ্লাসের মধ্য দিয়ে গোলাপি লাল বর্ণের বর্ণালি দেখায় কোন ক্যাটায়ন?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ব্লু গ্লাসে নিরীক্ষা: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="width: 1.395em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-509"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-510"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm K^+</script></span> → গোলাপী লাল; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="width: 2.215em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-518"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-519"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-size: 70.7%; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="width: 4.551em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-533"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm Cu^{2+},Na^+</script></span> → বিশেষ কোনো বর্ণ নেই।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬০]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: নেসলার দ্রবণের সংকেত - <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="width: 10.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1008.53em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-573"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-578"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-579"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-591"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm NaOH/KOH+K_2 [HgI_4]</script></span>&nbsp;এর মিশ্রণ।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯৫]</p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 54 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধিতে দ্রাব্যতা বৃদ্ধি পায় কোনটির?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="width: 4.192em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.418em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1003.42em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-596"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-598"><span style="display: inline-block; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬১]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 55 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>25</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="width: 2.759em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>108</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>5</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="width: 16.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1013.45em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-729"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-730"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-738"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-739"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-758"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1000.29em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-760"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-761"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-762" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">108</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-769"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>108</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>5</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm x^x y^x S^{(x+y)}=2^2.(3)^3.(S)^{(2+3)}=108 S^5 </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৭০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <br>

[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪১]</p>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\rm \frac 19 </script></span> গুণ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অভিকর্ষ বল দ্বারা কাজ উচ্চতা বা সরণের সমানুপাতিক।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: স্প্রিং ধ্রুবক এর একক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.09em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-838"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-840"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-842"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-843"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\rm Nm^{-1}</script></span>।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            <span>Question 62 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রৈখিক ও আবর্ত দুই ধরনের গতিশক্তি দেখা যায় কোনটিতে?</p>

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কিক করা ফুটবল</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বিনা বাধায় পতনশীল বস্তু রৈখিক গতি।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 63 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন বস্তুর গতিশক্তি 5 গুণ হলে, ভরবেগের কীরূপ পরিবর্তন ঘটবে?</p>

                                    </div>

clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-890"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>.</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>.</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm P^\prime=\sqrt{\frac{5E_k}{2m}=}\ \sqrt5.\sqrt{\frac{E_k}{2m}}=\sqrt5\ P. </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 64 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>60 kg ভরের একজন লোক 18 cm উঁচু&nbsp;10 টি সিঁড়ি 30 sec এ উঠতে পারেন। তার ক্ষমতা কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>60</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.18</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>35.28</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="width: 15.617em; margin-left: -2.621em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-907"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.33em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; <p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭৭]<br>
&nbsp;</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সংরক্ষণশীল বল: তড়িৎ বল, চৌম্বক বল, অভিকর্ষ বল, আদর্শ স্প্রিং-এর বিকৃতি প্রতিরোধী বল।<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৬১]</p>
</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>30</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-934" style="width: 18.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.33em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1015.33em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-935"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;
