font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-956"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-957"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.76em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-962"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-963"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>30</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm W=Fscos\theta=3\times10cos30=\frac{30\sqrt3}{2}=15\sqrt3&nbsp;</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৬৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6.67</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="width: 12.024em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1009.84em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1039"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6.67</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.325em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1043"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1044"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1046"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1047"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">23</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1052"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.82em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1057"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.459em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.5em, 4.374em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.503em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1059"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1060"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মহাকর্ষীয় ধ্রুবক G এর মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="width: 5.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.14em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1064"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1066"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.904em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1068"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1069"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1072"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1074"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1075"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1076" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1078"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm [M^{-1}T^{-2}L^3]</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪১৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 68 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন স্প্রিংকে 10 N&nbsp;বল দ্বারা টেনে 25 m প্রসারিত করা হলে স্প্রিং ধ্রুবক কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="width: 5.33em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="width: 10.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.89em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1130"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1133" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1134" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1139" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 69 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর ব্যাসার্ধ হঠাৎ দ্বিগুণ হয়ে গেল কিন্তু ভর অপরিবর্তিত রইল। ভূপৃষ্ঠে অভিকর্ষজ ত্বরণের মানের কীরূপ পরিবর্তন হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm g=\frac{GM}{R^2}; g^\prime=\frac{GM}{\left(2R\right)^2}=\frac{GM}{4R^2}=\frac{g}{4}&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪১৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 70 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সুষম ত্রিভুজাকৃতি পাতের অভিকর্ষ কেন্দ্র কোথায় অবস্থিত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কর্ণদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দুতে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মধ্যমাগুলোর ছেদবিন্দুতে</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জ্যামিতিক কেন্দ্রে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অক্ষের মধ্যবিন্দুতে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সুষম দণ্ডের ক্ষেত্রে - মধ্যবিন্দু;&nbsp;<br>
বেলনাকৃতি বস্তুর ক্ষেত্রে - অক্ষের মধ্যবিন্দু;<br>
সামান্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রে - কর্ণদ্বয়ের ছেদ বিন্দু।<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বুধ → <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4.3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.49em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1241"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4.3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1246"><span style="display: inline-block;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ভূ-স্থির উপগ্রহের প্রদক্ষিণ বেগ = <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3.08</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1348" style="width: 4.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.89em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1349"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.08</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1354"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1356"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1357"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1358" style="font-size: 70.7%; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 74 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>R পৃথিবীর ব্যাসার্ধ হলে ভূ-পৃষ্ঠ হতে কত নিচুতে g এর মান শূন্য হবে?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="width: 1.141em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ভূ-পৃষ্ঠ হতে h নিম্নতায়, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="width: 17.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.994em, 1014.1em, 5.74em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1366"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.141em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.994em, 1014.1em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1367"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">g</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1374"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1386" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1387" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1003.61em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -2.498em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\rm g^\prime=g\left(1-\frac{h}{R}\right)=0\Rightarrow1-\frac{h}{R}=0 \\ \therefore h=R&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Foreign travel is more pleasant than most other things.&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে Rabindranath শব্দটি Proper noun&nbsp;না বরং common noun।</p>

                                    <div class="row">

                                            <span>Question 82 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Choose the correct sentence-</p>

                                        </div>

                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>I shall not appear to the examination this year.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>I shall not appear from the examination this year.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>I shall not appear for the examination this year.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পরীক্ষায় অংশগ্রহণ করা বোঝাতে appear at ব্যবহার করা হয়।</p>

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সেলিম চৌধুরী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অসমাপ্ত আত্মজীবনী লিখার সময়কাল ছিল ১৯৬৬-৬৯ সাল।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
